titles.title: Jesus, Thou Joy of Loving Hearts

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, Thou Joy of loving hearts, Thou Fount of life, Thou Light of men, from the best bliss that earth imparts, we turn unfilled to Thee again.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: We taste Thee, O Thou living Bread, and long to feast upon Thee still; we drink of Thee, the Fountain-head, and thirst our souls from Thee to fill.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Our restless spirits yearn for Thee where'er our changeful lot is cast; glad, when Thy gracious smile we see, blest, when our faith can hold Thee fast.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O Jesus, ever with us stay; make all our moments calm and bright! chase the dark night of sin away, shed o'er the world Thy holy light.
